description: Retrieves information about a finding recommendation for the specified analyzer.

parameters.name: analyzerArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the analyzer used to generate the finding recommendation.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique ID for the finding recommendation.

nested_items.name: startedAt
nested_items.description: The time at which the retrieval of the finding recommendation was started.

nested_items.name: completedAt
nested_items.description: The time at which the retrieval of the finding recommendation was completed.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: A token used for pagination of results returned.

nested_items.name: code
nested_items.description: The error code for a failed retrieval of a recommendation for a finding.

nested_items.name: message
nested_items.description: The error message for a failed retrieval of a recommendation for a finding.

nested_items.name: resourceArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the resource of the finding.

nested_items.name: recommendedSteps
nested_items.description: A group of recommended steps for the finding.

nested_items.name: unusedPermissionsRecommendedStep
nested_items.description: A recommended step for an unused permissions finding.

nested_items.name: policyUpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The time at which the existing policy for the unused permissions finding was last updated.

nested_items.name: recommendedAction
nested_items.description: A recommendation of whether to create or detach a policy for an unused permissions finding.

nested_items.name: recommendedPolicy
nested_items.description: If the recommended action for the unused permissions finding is to replace the existing policy, the contents of the recommended policy to replace the policy specified in the existingPolicyId field.

nested_items.name: existingPolicyId
nested_items.description: If the recommended action for the unused permissions finding is to detach a policy, the ID of an existing policy to be detached.

nested_items.name: recommendationType
nested_items.description: The type of recommendation for the finding.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the retrieval of the finding recommendation.
